sentences.sentence: Any of various plants of the genus Allium with edible bulbs found growing wild.
sentences.translation: 野生的葱属众多植物的任何一种，具有可食的球茎。

sentences.sentence: This Allium is easy to grow and does well in average to rich, well drained soil.
sentences.translation: 这葱很容易成长，并好于平均，以丰富，排水良好的土壤。

sentences.sentence: Plant all varieties of Allium in rich, well-drained soil in full sun in early fall.
sentences.translation: 所有植物品种的葱丰富，良好的土壤流失，在充分孙在秋季初完成。
